title: Build complete Rabindra Bharati Art Academy digital platform

requirements.text: Create artistic, childhood-friendly homepage with information about the academy, location & contact info, and mobile-friendly design
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays academy information in a child-friendly visual style
About section describes the academy
Location and contact information is clearly displayed
Layout is responsive and works on mobile devices

requirements.text: Create public admission page with information about the admission process and exam system
acceptanceCriteria: Admission page explains the application process
Exam system information is accessible to visitors
Page is publicly accessible without login

requirements.text: Create public gallery page displaying best student artwork
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays artwork uploaded by teachers
Only artworks marked as public are visible
Artwork can be tagged by level
Gallery is accessible without login

requirements.text: Add floating WhatsApp chat button for visitor communication
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button floats on all public pages
Button opens WhatsApp chat when clicked
Button is mobile-friendly

requirements.text: Build online admission form collecting student details, guardian details, and artwork sample upload with teacher approval workflow
acceptanceCriteria: Form collects student personal information
Form collects guardian contact details
Students can upload artwork samples
Submission enters pending state requiring teacher approval
Form validation ensures required fields are complete

requirements.text: Implement automatic generation of admission number, login account, and assigned exam level upon teacher approval of admission

quotes: Auto creation of: Admission Number, Login account, Assigned exam level

acceptanceCriteria: Unique admission number is generated automatically
Student login credentials are created
Initial exam level is assigned
Generation occurs only after teacher approval

requirements.text: Create secure login system with separate student and teacher login, role-based access control, and no public signup
acceptanceCriteria: Students can log in with their credentials
Teachers can log in with their credentials
Users can only access features allowed by their role
No public registration page exists
Authentication is secure

requirements.text: Build student dashboard displaying profile, current exam level, messages & notices, homework section with reference images, and live class access
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows student profile information
Current exam level is prominently displayed
Student can view messages and notices for their level
Homework assignments are listed with reference images
Live class stream is embedded and accessible
Only level-specific content is shown

requirements.text: Implement exam level progression system with levels: Adhya, Madhya, Purna, 1st Year through 8th Year, with one exam per year and teacher-controlled promotion

quotes: Adhya ‚Üí Madhya ‚Üí Purna ‚Üí 1st Year ‚Üí 2nd Year ‚Üí 3rd Year ‚Üí 4th Year ‚Üí 5th Year ‚Üí 6th Year ‚Üí 7th Year ‚Üí 8th Year ‚Üí Next Level / Degree

acceptanceCriteria: System supports all 11 exam levels in order
Students can only take one exam per year
Teachers can promote students to the next level
Students only see content for their current level
Level progression follows the defined sequence

requirements.text: Store exam history in database accessible only to teachers for tracking promotions and generating certificates
acceptanceCriteria: Exam history records are persisted in database
Only teachers can view exam history
History includes student progression through levels
Data is available for certificate generation

requirements.text: Build teacher panel to add students, approve admissions, assign exam levels, promote students, view student progress, and manage student list
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can manually add new students
Teachers can approve or reject admission applications
Teachers can assign initial exam levels
Teachers can promote students to next level
Teachers can view individual student progress
Teachers can see and manage complete student list

requirements.text: Create message and homework system allowing teachers to send level-specific notices, assign homework, upload reference images, and send exam instructions
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can create messages targeted to specific exam levels
Teachers can assign homework with descriptions
Teachers can upload multiple reference images per assignment
Teachers can send exam-related instructions
Students only receive messages for their current level

requirements.text: Implement art-specific teaching features including reference painting upload, sketch demo images, color guide images, and level-wise practice topics
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can upload reference paintings
Teachers can upload sketch demonstrations
Teachers can upload color guidance materials
Practice topics can be assigned per level
Students can view all teaching materials for their level

requirements.text: Build high-quality live class streaming system embedded in dashboard where teachers broadcast and students watch
acceptanceCriteria: Live stream is embedded directly in student dashboard
Only teachers can start and control the broadcast
Students can watch with clear video quality
Stream performs better than typical video conferencing tools
No external application required

requirements.text: Create gallery management system for teachers to upload best artworks, tag by level, and set public or private visibility
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can upload artwork images
Each artwork can be tagged with exam level
Teachers can mark artworks as public (visible to all) or private (teacher-only)
Public artworks appear in the public gallery
Gallery is organized by level

requirements.text: Build advanced teacher dashboard with analytics showing total students, students per level, growth tracking, and charts
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays total number of students
Dashboard shows breakdown of students by exam level
Growth metrics track student enrollment over time
Visual charts present analytics data
Dashboard provides actionable insights

requirements.text: Implement backend data models and storage for students, exam levels, exam history, messages, homework, and admission data

quotes: Stores: Students, Levels, Exam history, Messages, Homework, Admission data

acceptanceCriteria: Student records are persisted with profile data
Exam level definitions are stored
Exam history tracks student progression
Messages and notices are stored with level targeting
Homework assignments are persisted with reference images
Admission applications are stored with approval status

requirements.text: Implement security features including role-based access control, password encryption, and protection of student data from public access
acceptanceCriteria: User roles (student, teacher) determine access permissions
Passwords are encrypted before storage
Student personal data is not exposed to public
Teachers control all administrative functions
Authentication tokens are secure

requirements.text: Design child-friendly, colorful UI with light theme, easy navigation, and full mobile responsiveness across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: UI uses bright, welcoming colors appropriate for children
Layout is intuitive and easy to navigate
All pages are fully responsive on mobile devices
Typography and spacing are child-friendly
Visual design is consistent across the application

constraints: No public signup - all student accounts created through admission approval only
Students can only see content for their current exam level
Only one exam per year per student
Live streaming must be embedded in dashboard without external applications
Teacher approval required for all admissions
Exam history accessible only to teachers
nonGoals: Student artwork upload to portfolio (future feature)
External database like MongoDB (platform uses Motoko backend storage)

required: Artistic, colorful academy logo with paintbrush and palette motifs suitable for children (academy-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Warm, inviting hero banner image showing children painting in an art classroom (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
Friendly illustration of art supplies including paintbrushes, palettes, and canvases (art-supplies-illustration.dim_800x600.png)
Gallery placeholder image showing an empty easel waiting for artwork (gallery-placeholder.dim_400x300.png)
Student dashboard welcome illustration with colorful art elements (dashboard-welcome.dim_600x400.png)
Teacher panel header illustration showing instructor with students (teacher-panel-header.dim_800x300.png)
